description: Historical map collection for DataAcuity Maps - Public Domain
sources: Internet Archive - Public Domain Maps Dealing with Ancient History
Library of Congress Geography and Map Division

maps.title: Orbis Veteribus Notus - The World Known to the Ancients
maps.description: Shows the world as known to ancient civilizations

maps.description: Detailed map of Ancient Egypt along the Nile

maps.description: Comparison of ancient and modern Egyptian geography

maps.description: Classical Greece with city-states and regions

maps.description: The Achaemenid Persian Empire at its height

maps.description: Routes of Alexander the Great's conquests

maps.title: Ancient Roman Empire
maps.description: The Roman Empire at its greatest extent

maps.description: Western portion of the Roman Empire

maps.description: Eastern Roman/Byzantine Empire

maps.title: Palestine in Ancient Times
maps.description: The Holy Land in biblical times

maps.title: Ancient and Modern Syria
maps.description: Syria through the ages

maps.description: Ancient Turkey/Anatolia with Greek and Roman names

maps.description: Germanic tribes and Roman frontier

maps.description: Italian peninsula with Latin and Etruscan names

maps.description: Africa as known to ancient cartographers

maps.description: Medieval worldview with Jerusalem at center - the largest surviving medieval map

maps.description: First modern atlas - revolutionary in cartographic history

maps.description: Beautifully decorated world map from the Dutch Golden Age of cartography

maps.description: 18th century world map showing increased geographic knowledge

maps.title: Map of the World
